name: Ghost Hunt 64x
description:
A small-scale game made for LOWREZJAM2022 in about 2 days, with a few extra for miscellaneous UI work and porting to web.  Search a derelict mansion foyer for ghosts, shine your flashlight on them to paralyze them, and deftly eliminate them with your knife! But watch out for The Sleeper...

This game features what one might consider "jumpscares", so if you take issue with that be warned (they aren't all that scary though). Special thanks to Saturnyoshi for extensive knowledge on Gamemaker, Poyo for the original design of The Sleeper, and jsfxr for being the tool I used for all the sound design.

CONTROLS:

LMB: FLASHLIGHT

RMB: KNIFE
